videooutput: Support CVBS video output and overlying DDNS, user name, password and other info.
minillumination: Color:0.6Lux (F1.2, AGC ON),0 LUX with IR Black/white: 0.08Lux (F1.2, AGC ON), 0LUX with IR
intelligentalarm: Motion detect, video lost, network break, IP conflict, storage device full or error
videocompression: H. 264 High Profile, support dual stream, AVI format; support 0.1M~6Mpbs bit rate adjustable; support 1~30fps adjustable.
imagesetting: Saturation, brightness, contrast can be adjusted via client side or IE browser
basic: Support WEB remote configuration, OSD, motion detect, alarm input active to record, snapshot
daynight: IR-CUT filter double light switch ,automatically shift  from color to B/W, Night vision 40M
